name: Chicken Satay With Peanut Sauce
author: Allrecipes
summary: Flavorful Thai-style chicken skewers are topped with a sweet and spicy peanut sauce. Serve with white rice for a complete meal!
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips
directions: Combine 1/2 cup coconut milk, 2 teaspoons curry powder, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1 teaspoon fish sauce, and granulated garlic in a bowl; add chicken pieces and toss to coat
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours
Thread marinated chicken pieces onto skewers
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook chicken skewers in hot oil until browned and no longer pink in the center, 3 to 4 minutes on each side
Bring 3/4 cup coconut milk to a simmer in small saucepan or skillet over medium heat
Stir 1 tablespoon curry powder into the coconut milk and simmer for 4 minutes
Add chicken broth, peanut butter, 1 tablespoon sugar, lime juice, and 1 tablespoon fish sauce; simmer for 1 minute
Serve dipping sauce with chicken skewers
